alert.note: Alert for Powhatan; Western Chesterfield (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chesterfield and central Powhatan Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Powhatan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Powhatan, Moseley, Bon Air, Macon, Goodwins Store, Flat Rock, Pilkinton, Jefferson, Midlothian, Skinquarter, Fine Creek Mills, Holly Hills, Clayville, Genito, Worshams and Subletts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
